B

BattleController - Class in controller
Controller for a BattlePanel object.
BattleController(BattleshipModel, BattlePanel) - Constructor for class controller.BattleController
Constructor for the class BattleController.
BattlePanel - Class in view
Class that represent the board of the Battleship game, and shows all the moves taken both by the Player and the Computer.
BattlePanel(BattleshipModel, BattleshipController) - Constructor for class view.BattlePanel
Constructor for the class BattlePanel.
BattleshipController - Class in controller
Controller manager for the MVC paradigm.
BattleshipController(BattleshipModel) - Constructor for class controller.BattleshipController
Constructor for the class BattleshipController.
BATTLESHIPLENGTH - Static variable in class utils.ShipLength
 
BattleshipModel - Class in model
Model of the Battleship boardgame simulator.
BattleshipModel() - Constructor for class model.BattleshipModel
Default constructor for the class BattleshipModel.
BattleshipModel(int) - Constructor for class model.BattleshipModel
Constructor for the class BattleshipModel, which initializes a default instance of BattleshipModel from the game size it receives as parameter.
BattleshipModel(Player, Computer, int, boolean, int) - Constructor for class model.BattleshipModel
Constructor for the class BattleshipModel.
BattleshipMVC - Class in upo.battleship.rossi
The main of the Battleship application.
BattleshipMVC() - Constructor for class upo.battleship.rossi.BattleshipMVC
 
BattleshipState - Enum in utils
Utility Enum containing each possible state for a BattleshipModel object.
BattleshipView - Class in view
Class that represents the JFrame where all panels with their content are shown.
BattleshipView(BattleshipModel) - Constructor for class view.BattleshipView
Constructor for the class BattleshipView.
